英文法規名稱: National Palace Museum Fee Standards for Viewing,Copying or Duplicating Library and Archival Materials
中文法規名稱: 國立故宮博物院資料閱覽抄錄複製收費標準
沿革內容:
1.Promulgated on April 09, 2008
2.Article 2 amended by National Palace Museum Tai-Bo-Mi-Tzu No.11010019781 are promulgated on October 5th, 2021.

法規內容.條文內容: The fee standards are enacted according to Paragraph 1 of Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.
The fees for copying or duplicating materials at the library of the National Palace Museum (hereafter as NPM) are listed in the attached document.
When permitted to view, copy or duplicate archives of the NPM, a fee is charged in accordance with the Fee Standards to View, Copy or Duplicate Archives of the National Archives Administration.
The fee standards shall take effect from the date of promulgation.
